instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: `recharts` for small sparkline charts in the dashboard.
INSTALL: `react-tradingview-widget` or use the iframe embed for the main chart.
CRITICAL: Use `en-IN` formatting for all currency numbers (e.g., 1,50,000.00).
CRITICAL: Positive P&L must be Green (#22C55E), Negative P&L must be Red (#EF4444).
LAYOUT: The Trading Page must simulate a 'Pro' terminal. Left sidebar for Navigation, Inner Left for Watchlist, Center for Chart, Right for Order Entry/Depth.
STATE: Use a global context or specialized hook for 'Market Data Simulation'. The price should tick every 1-2 seconds.
MICRO-INTERACTION: When price goes up, flash the cell green background briefly. When down, flash red.
THEME: Default to DARK mode. Light mode is secondary.
Avoid standard Shadcn 'Card' for the Watchlist items—make them compact rows with hover effects.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for main backgrounds; use solid deep grays/blacks.
Use 1px borders with low opacity (white/10) to define structure.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, rows).
Don't center text in tables—align numbers to the right, text to the left.
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications (Order Placed, Order Rejected).
Ensure the 'Buy' and 'Sell' panels are distinct visually (Green theme vs Red theme).
